channel.title: renewable energy on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in renewable energy on FinanClub

item.title: Shell Hikes Dividend, Focuses on Oil and Gas
item.description: Shell Hikes Dividend, Focuses on Oil and Gas Shell has announced a 15% increase in its dividend, the first increase since 2019. The company is also increasing its focus on oil and gas production, as it sees this as the best way to generate cash flow in the short term.

item.title: Bloomberg NEF Gateway Morocco: Latest News and Updates
item.description: Morocco is a leading country in the global transition to a clean energy future. The country has already installed over 2 gigawatts of solar and wind power, and it is on track to meet its target of generating 52% of its electricity from renewable energy by 2030.

item.title: Simson Says EU Still in Talks on Renewables Deal (Video)
item.description: The European Union is in talks with member states to increase the bloc’s renewable energy target to 40% by 2030. The current target is 32%. The talks are being led by Energy Commissioner Kadri Simson. Simson said on Tuesday that she is confident that a deal can be reached.
